release_notes:
- Version 2.2.3 Release

New features:
- Map locks can now be chosen individually, improves keys stash management
- Locks tracked on the items tracker will show on the panel, tracking how many you have before going into raid. NEVER FORGET A KEY AGAIN[maybe]
- Some Market features changed to be manually set, making it usable on 1.0 again, players can now take advantage of the market features - More Info will be Available on Discord

Fixes:
- Selecting to not center map on player or vice versa would not work before an restart
